function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Employees being infected with Covid-19","Impact":"Health impacts on infected individuals, potential spread within the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and safety protocols, providing medical and financial support to infected employees","Technologies":"Contact-tracing apps, temperature screening devices, air purification systems","People":"Employees, business partners, frontline fighters","Owner":"Employers, business partners, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Financial hardship for employees and business partners","Impact":"Reduced well-being, inability to afford essentials, impact on mental health","Mitigation":"Providing financial assistance, support for food and shelter, mental health services","Technologies":"Online payment systems, financial aid platforms, mental health apps","People":"Employees, business partners","Owner":"Employers, business partners"},{"Description":"Risk of contagion for frontline Covid-19 fighters","Impact":"Health risks, potential spread of infection, increased burden on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Providing protective equipment, supporting local initiatives, promoting vaccination","Technologies":"PPE, rapid testing kits, vaccination tracking systems","People":"Frontline Covid-19 fighters, medical workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, employers"}]}
